name: youtube.com - Hide playlist cycle buttons [HTML5]
description: A style that hides the playlist cycle buttons for viewing videos next and previous in a playlist.
additional_info: Find your force of habit forces you to view the previous video? Dislike the new playlist cycle buttons in the bottom bar of the player? Install this and they go away. This is a universal style that works independent of theme, so this can be paired rather nicely with other YouTube styles without a problem. For this to work, you need to request the HTML5 player, and even then it will only work in videos where the HTML5 player is enabled.
